sentences.sentence: With all of your fierceness, come smash this foul enemy!
sentences.translation: 用您的凶猛粉碎这个邪恶的敌人！

sentences.sentence: In spite of their fierceness the dogs are very kind to their masters and kids.
sentences.translation: 尽管狗很凶猛，但是它们对主人和孩子非常友善。

sentences.sentence: You cannot even begin to imagine the fierceness of their plans for you ones.
sentences.translation: 你们甚至无法想象他们针对你们所做计划的残酷性。
